title: Power Rangers: New Villain For Ninja Steel Revealed

organizations.name: new villain for ninja steel revealed power rangers

saban brands' power rangers ninja steel

text:
Power Rangers: New Villain For Ninja Steel Revealed Matthew Mueller Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
While the Power Rangers are gearing up for the big film reboot that's coming next year, don't forget about the upcoming new season of the popular television series, Power Rangers Ninja Steel. 
The new season of Power Rangers will feature an all new Megazord and new enemies, and thanks to Power Rangers NOW fans finally have a glimpse at some of the threats the all new Rangers will have to face. In the henchmen role are the Kudabots, and will be the main cannon fodder the Rangers will face while on the ground. When the going gets tough though the Kudabots have a second more powerful form, and in this form they are called Bashers. 
There will also be what are known as Skullgators. These are much more formidable foes that require the Megazord, and they will pop in regularly throughout the season. 
You can view all the images in the gallery, and the official synopsis can be found below. 
"With the franchiseâ€™s 24th season, Saban Brands' Power Rangers Ninja Steel starts deep in space, where Galvanax is the reigning champion of the most popular intergalactic game show in the universe in which monsters battle to prove who is the mightiest warrior. Galvanax is determined to become invincible by controlling the mythical Ninja Nexus Prism, which contains six supernatural Ninja Power Stars. The only thing standing in his way is a new team of heroic teenage Power Rangers who possess it. The evil Galvanax sends his warrior contestants down to Earth to steal the Ninja Power Stars, where each epic battle against the Power Rangers is broadcast throughout the universe. Together, the Rangers must master their arsenal of Ninja Power Stars, Zords and Megazords, each made of legendary Ninja Steel, in order to stop this evil threat and save Earth from destruction." 
Power Rangers Ninja Steel debuts on Nickelodeon January 21st, 2017. Power Rangers hits theaters on March 24, 2017.
